name: Egret II Mini
whySpecs: The Taito Egret II Mini uses the SD card slot for firmware updates and loading additional games via official expansion packs or side-loading. It does not require high speeds.

faq.q: What is the slot used for?
faq.a: Typically used for firmware updates to fix input lag, or for loading extra games if you have the knowledge to set it up.

notes: Uses a full-size SD slot (or microSD with adapter).
